abstract: While Mrs. Clinton has been popular in New Hampshire, her favorable ratings have dropped since February, while Mr. Sanders’s have been climbing, and a CNN/WMUR poll released on Thursday has them in a statistical tie.

headline.main: New Hampshire Poll Shows Bernie Sanders in Dead Heat With Hillary Clinton

snippet: While Mrs. Clinton has been popular in New Hampshire, her favorable ratings have dropped since February, while Mr. Sanders’s have been climbing, and a CNN/WMUR poll released on Thursday has them in a statistical tie.
